Notes: A large Boo surrounded by four smaller Boos that can move on a path or move forwards indefinitely. They damage the player upon contact. It will be defeated when it enters a GlaringLightArea or a SunLightArea. If Obj_arg2 is set, it will spawn a Power Star when defeated, however, this requires a properly configured Scenario entry.

Obj_arg0.Name: Movement Speed
Obj_arg0.Description: The rate at which it moves. Default is 10.

Obj_arg1.Name: Matter Splatter Drop Size
Obj_arg1.Description: The radius of the Matter Splatter drop. Default is 0 which disables the drop.

Obj_arg2.Name: Power Star Type
Obj_arg2.Description: If non-negative, it will register and spawn a Power Star.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

Rail.Description: The optional path that it can move on.
